Description: AVAILABLE 10/01/2023 An extremely large, and modernized 3 bedroom, 2 full bath rental apartment located in a semi-luxury building on Monmouth Street in Brookline and the border of Boston. The unit is located in a professionally managed building that is just steps to Longwood Medical area, Beacon Street, the MBTA C & D lines, Park Drive, Beacon St, Boston University, and Fenway. Additional features include heat and hot water included in the rent, a private balcony, a large kitchen with full-size appliances, a large amount of closet space, an updated bath, and a huge living area with large windows and polished hardwood floors. The master bedroom has includes a full bathroom and walk-in closet. The building features include a 24-hour doorman, swimming pool, and garage parking available for rent! Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
